title: [Determination of seven phenolic acids in whole wheat flour by high-performance liquid chromatography].
abstract: A high-performance liquid chromatography(HPLC) method was established for the simultaneous determination of 7 phenolic acids(ferulic acid, p-coumaric acid, vanillic acid, butyric acid, p-hydroxybenzoic acid, salicylic acid, sinapic acid) in whole wheat flour, to understand further the phenolic acid substances contained in whole wheat flour and the content level.
journal: Wei sheng yan jiu = Journal of hygiene research

POLYPHENOL: 7 phenolic acids(ferulic acid, p-coumaric acid, vanillic acid, butyric acid, p-hydroxybenzoic acid, salicylic acid, sinapic acid
